meanings.definition: To place or arrange (papers, documents, etc.) incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: I always misfile important papers in the wrong folders.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to misfile any documents in the office.
meanings.sent3: Oops, I misfiled the papers again! Silly me.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jumbled mess, like a misfiled cabinet.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misfiling can be quite serious in a professional setting.

meanings.definition: An instance of placing or arranging something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misfile of the report caused confusion in the office.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to correct any misfiles in the filing system.
meanings.sent3: Finding a misfile in the documents was like a little puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent4: The misfile was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The misfile stood out like a sore thumb among the neatly organized files.
